summary: GRACO-CAR SEAT/ BOOSTER SEAT.   MR  THE CONSUMER STATED THE COUPLING DEVICE ON THE CAR SEAT SHOULD BE REDESIGNED WITH A PLASTIC DEVICE, BECAUSE THE HARD PLASTIC DEVICE IN WHICH THE CHILD WOULD BE SECURED BY COULD BECOME INJURED IF THE VEHICLE WAS REAR ENDED AT A HIGH RATE OF SPEED. THE DEVICE WOULD NO DOUBT MOVE FORWARD AND THE DEVICE COULD STRIKE THE CHILD IN THE THROAT.  *JB
